title: Adapting to the stream: an instance-attention GNN method for irregular multivariate time series data
details: K Han, AMY Koay, RKL Ko, W Chen, M Xu - Frontiers of Computer Science, 2025
abstract: Multivariate time series (MTS) data are vital for various applications, particularly in machine learning tasks. However, challenges such as sensor failures can result in irregular and misaligned data with missing values, thereby complicating their …

title: Federated learning meets Bayesian neural network: Robust and uncertainty-aware distributed variational inference
details: P Li, Q Hu, X Wang - Neural Networks, 2025
abstract: Federated Learning (FL) is a popular framework for data privacy protection in distributed machien learning. However, current FL faces some several problems and challenges, including the limited amount of client data and data heterogeneity. These …
